\chapter{post数据测试}
\label{post:post}\label{post::doc}

\section{环境}
\label{post:id1}
rhel5.7

2核虚拟机

4G内存


\section{安装pycurl}
\label{post:pycurl}
\begin{Verbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
yum install python\PYGZhy{}pycurl.x86\PYGZus{}64
\end{Verbatim}


\section{安装PHP}
\label{post:php}
\begin{Verbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
wget http://us1.php.net/get/php\PYGZhy{}5.5.5.tar.gz/from/cn2.php.net/mirror
tar zxf php\PYGZhy{}5.5.5.tar.gz
yum install libxml2\PYGZhy{}devel.x86\PYGZus{}64
\PYG{n+nb}{cd }php\PYGZhy{}5.5.5
./configure
make \PYGZhy{}j 4
make install
\end{Verbatim}


\section{安装php的curl扩展}
\label{post:phpcurl}
\begin{Verbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n+nb}{cd }php\PYGZhy{}5.5.5/ext/curl
phpize
./configure
make \PYGZhy{}j 4
make install
\end{Verbatim}


\section{测试方法}
\label{post:id2}
把test.php放至网站root下，使url \href{http://127.0.0.1/test}{http://127.0.0.1/test}.php可以访问到。

开10个进程同时测试：

\begin{Verbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
php curl\PYGZus{}test.php \PYGZam{} php curl\PYGZus{}test.php \PYGZam{} php curl\PYGZus{}test.php \PYGZam{} php curl\PYGZus{}test.php \PYGZam{} php curl\PYGZus{}test.php \PYGZam{} php curl\PYGZus{}test.php \PYGZam{} php curl\PYGZus{}test.php \PYGZam{} php curl\PYGZus{}test.php \PYGZam{} php curl\PYGZus{}test.php \PYGZam{} php curl\PYGZus{}test.php \PYGZam{}

python curl\PYGZus{}test.py \PYGZam{} python curl\PYGZus{}test.py \PYGZam{} python curl\PYGZus{}test.py \PYGZam{} python curl\PYGZus{}test.py \PYGZam{} python curl\PYGZus{}test.py \PYGZam{} python curl\PYGZus{}test.py \PYGZam{} python curl\PYGZus{}test.py \PYGZam{} python curl\PYGZus{}test.py \PYGZam{} python curl\PYGZus{}test.py \PYGZam{} python curl\PYGZus{}test.py \PYGZam{}
\end{Verbatim}

urllib2\_test.py, socket\_test.py测试方法相同

每个进程发送10000条post消息，程序结束后出现的秒数除post的总数量，即每秒发送的消息数
\begin{quote}


\end{quote}


\section{测试结果}
\label{post:id3}
每秒处理10000左右数据，

\label{post:id4}
多线程CURL测试文件 curl\_mt.py

多进程测试文件 curl\_mp.py

测试方法：直接运行 python filename
